aarque...GROW UP!

I have been seeding for two days now. I seed during the day when I am not home and at night while I sleep. The tracker system is no longer reliable since about the time TPB started using the magnet links.

I have had to re-upload torrents because they just wouldn't seed. Apparently it happens occasionally. I assumed, because of the first three comments, that people were getting the torrent. However, I clearly do check back. If people are willing to verify - reasonably and not in all capital letters - that they have been leeching for more than a few hours and they get no "bits," I will kill this torrent and load another.
